Name: zirconium oxide production | zirconium oxide | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Caustic fusion of zircon mineral (ZrSiO4) with sodium hydroxide to zirconium hydroxide. No allocation to sodium silicate by-product. Calcination of zirconium hydroxide to zirconium oxide.
